introLessons.title: Intro
introLessons.subtitle: INTRODUCTION LESSON
introLessons.description: MENTORY is a form of experiencing a need that is characterized by awareness (what I want), understanding of the motive (why I want it) and there is an idea of possible ways to satisfy (how can I achieve this). Number of desires of one person is not limited by anything - they differ in terms of objects, sustainability, methods of satisfaction, etc. In accordance with these criteria, they identify feasible desires and unrealistic, reckless, targeted and others.
